# GitHub REST API Documentation Sitemap

## REST API

- [REST API Home](https://docs.github.com/en/rest?apiVersion=2022-11-28)

### About the REST API
- [About the REST API](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/about)
  - [Comparing GitHub's APIs](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/comparing-githubs-apis)
  - [API Versions](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/api-versions)
  - [Breaking changes](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/breaking-changes)
  - [OpenAPI description](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/openapi-description)

### Using the REST API
- [Getting started](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/quickstart)
- [Rate limits](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using/rate-limits-for-the-rest-api)
- [Pagination](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)
- [Libraries](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using/libraries)
- [Best practices](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using/best-practices-for-using-the-rest-api)
- [Troubleshooting](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using/troubleshooting)
- [Timezones](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using/timezones)
- [CORS and JSONP](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using/cors)
- [Issue event types](https://docs.github.com/en/webhooks-and-events/events/github-event-types)
- [GitHub event types](https://docs.github.com/en/webhooks-and-events/events/github-event-types)

### Authentication
- [Authenticating](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/authenticating-to-the-rest-api)
- [Keeping API credentials secure](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/keeping-your-api-credentials-secure)
- [Endpoints for GitHub App installation tokens](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/authentication/token-based-authentication)
- [Endpoints for GitHub App user tokens](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/authentication/token-based-authentication)
- [Endpoints for fine-grained PATs](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/authentication/token-based-authentication)
- [Permissions for GitHub Apps](https://docs.github.com/en/apps/permissions)
- [Permissions for fine-grained PATs](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/permissions-required-for-fine-grained-personal-access-tokens)

### Guides
- [Script with JavaScript](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/guides/scripting-with-the-rest-api-and-javascript)
- [Script with Ruby](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/guides/scripting-with-the-rest-api-and-ruby)
- [Discover resources for a user](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/guides/discovering-resources-for-a-user)
- [Delivering deployments](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/guides/delivering-deployments)
- [Rendering data as graphs](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/guides/rendering-data-as-graphs)

- [Building a CI server](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/guides/building-a-ci-server)
